message.content:
I need to identify and extract the total income from the income statement, along with its constituent line items.

Looking at the income statement, I can see that "Total Revenue" represents the total income arising from ordinary activities, with a value of 5991764.34.

The constituent line item that makes up this total revenue is:
- Main Business Revenue: 5991764.34

Since there's only one sub-item that makes up the total revenue (Main Business Revenue), I'll include that as the only sub-item.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '5991764.34', 'sub_items': {'sub_item value': '5991764.34'}}}
```
